aboutParagraph1: Book space is the single most important European travel book store. This spacious store offers a selection of books, maps, conferences, coworking spaces and bar. Founded in 1996, 'Book space' is a store dedicated to all nature lovers, home of the largest natural history book collection in the world!
aboutParagraph2: In our book store there are many events and conferences. The most famous writers performed in our stage, presenting their new books. Check out our events here
aboutParagraph3: Our space offers to you to work in calm and comfortable environment and beautiful bar with huge history. Check out our menu here
